other_tests.findings: Normal mucosa in the stomach, duodenum; irregular z-line in the GE junction; random biopsies also demonstrated normal mucosa on pathology.

The appendix is fluid-filled, measuring up to 0.8 cm; focal hyperemia at the appendiceal base with focal wall thickening up to 3 mm; mild thickening of the cecum at the base of the appendix and mild mesenteric stranding.
